legal.title: Legal Notice - AI Chef Pro
legal.description: Legal information about AI Chef Pro, terms of use and general conditions.
legal.heading: Legal Notice
legal.content: This page contains legal information related to the use of AI Chef Pro and its services.
content_paragraphs:
1. General Information

Website Owner: John Guerrero

Trade Name: AI Chef Pro

Contact Email: info@aichef.pro

Phone: +34 744 717 942

2. Purpose and Activity

AI Chef Pro is an artificial intelligence platform specialized in gastronomy that offers tools and applications for cooking professionals. Our services include more than 55 specialized applications covering from culinary creativity to gastronomic business management.

3. Intellectual Property

All content, trademarks, logos, designs, source codes, databases and any other elements that are part of AI Chef Pro are protected by intellectual and industrial property laws. Reproduction, distribution or public communication without express authorization is prohibited.

4. Content Responsibility

AI Chef Pro reserves the right to modify, update or delete content without prior notice. We do not guarantee the availability, continuity or infallibility of the service, although we put all technical means at our disposal to avoid interruptions.

5. External Links

Our website may contain links to third-party websites. AI Chef Pro is not responsible for the content, privacy policies or practices of these external sites.

6. Privacy Policy

The processing of personal data is governed by our Privacy Policy, available on this same website, where detailed information is provided about the collection, use and protection of personal data.

7. Applicable Legislation

This legal notice is governed by Spanish legislation. For any dispute, the parties submit to the competent courts and tribunals according to current legislation.

8. Contact

For any legal consultation or complaint, you can contact us at: info@aichef.pro or +34 744 717 942

cookies.title: Cookie Policy - AI Chef Pro
cookies.description: Information about the use of cookies on AI Chef Pro and how to manage your preferences.
cookies.heading: Cookie Policy
cookies.content: At AI Chef Pro we use cookies to improve your user experience and offer you personalized content.
content_paragraphs:
1. What are cookies?

Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit AI Chef Pro. They help us remember your preferences and improve your experience with our culinary artificial intelligence tools.

2. Types of Cookies We Use

Essential cookies: Necessary for the basic functioning of our AI applications.

Preference cookies: Remember your personalized culinary settings.

Analytical cookies: Help us understand how you use our tools to improve them.

3. Purpose of Cookies

We use cookies to personalize your gastronomic experience, remember your favorite recipes, keep your sessions active and analyze the use of our culinary AI applications to improve our services.

4. Cookie Management

You can configure your browser to reject cookies, although this could affect the functionality of some of our AI tools. You can also delete stored cookies at any time from your browser settings.

5. Third Party Cookies

Some cookies may be set by third party services we use for analytics and additional functionality. These third parties have their own privacy policies.

6. Updates

This cookie policy may be updated periodically. We will notify you of significant changes and the date of the last update.

7. Contact

If you have questions about our use of cookies, contact us at: info@aichef.pro or +34 744 717 942

privacy.title: Privacy Policy - AI Chef Pro
privacy.description: Information about how we protect and treat your personal data at AI Chef Pro.
privacy.heading: Privacy Policy
privacy.content: Your privacy is important to us. This policy explains how we collect, use and protect your personal information.
content_paragraphs:
1. Information We Collect

At AI Chef Pro, we collect information when you interact with our culinary artificial intelligence services. This includes registration data, gastronomic preferences, and technical information about the use of our applications.

2. Use of Information

We use your information to personalize your culinary experience, improve our AI tools, provide technical support and develop new gastronomic functionalities that adapt to your professional needs.

3. Data Protection

We implement technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure or destruction. Your data is encrypted and stored securely.

4. Information Sharing

We do not sell, market or transfer your personal information to third parties, except when necessary to provide our services or when required by law.

5. Your Rights

You have the right to access, rectify, delete and port your personal data. You can also object to processing and request its limitation by contacting us.

6. Cookies and Similar Technologies

We use cookies to improve the functionality of our culinary AI applications and personalize your experience. You can manage your cookie preferences at any time.

7. Contact

For any inquiries related to this privacy policy, you can contact us at: info@aichef.pro or +34 744 717 942

terms.title: Terms and Conditions - AI Chef Pro
terms.description: Terms and conditions of use of AI Chef Pro and its services.
terms.heading: Terms and Conditions
terms.content: These terms and conditions govern the use of AI Chef Pro and its services.
content_paragraphs:
1. Acceptance of Terms

By accessing and using AI Chef Pro, you accept these terms and conditions. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, you should not use our culinary artificial intelligence services.

2. Service Description

AI Chef Pro is an artificial intelligence platform specialized in gastronomy that offers more than 55 tools for cooking professionals, including culinary creativity, world cookbooks and business management.

3. User Registration and Account

To access certain functionalities, you must create an account providing accurate and updated information. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password.

4. Permitted Use

You may use AI Chef Pro for legitimate gastronomic professional purposes. Use for illegal activities, spam, or any activity that may harm our services or other users is not permitted.

5. Intellectual Property

All content, trademarks, logos and technologies of AI Chef Pro are owned by John Guerrero or its licensors. Recipes and content generated by AI may be used by the user according to their subscription.

6. Subscriptions and Payments

We offer different subscription plans with different functionalities. Payments are processed securely and renewals are automatic according to the chosen plan.

7. Limitations and Responsibilities

AI Chef Pro is provided 'as is'. We do not guarantee that the service is free of errors or interruptions. Our responsibility is limited to the amount paid for the service.

8. Termination

We may suspend or terminate your account if you breach these terms. You can cancel your subscription at any time from your user panel.

9. Modifications

We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. We will notify you of important changes by email or through notices on the platform.

10. Contact

For any inquiries about these terms, you can contact us at: info@aichef.pro or +34 744 717 942

banner.title: We use cookies
banner.description: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience, analyze site traffic, and personalize content. By clicking 'Accept', you consent to the use of all cookies.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: We solve the most common questions about AI Chef Pro
faq.q1: What is AI Chef Pro and how can it benefit me as a chef or gastronomy professional?
faq.a1: AI Chef Pro is a Suite of AI Tools and Applications, models trained for daily use by Chefs, Cooks and hospitality professionals. It offers tools that boost your creativity, improve your management and expand your culinary knowledge. As a leader in any field of cooking or gastronomy, you'll be able to explore new flavor combinations, optimize your processes and stay up to date with the latest gastronomic trends. AI Chef Pro allows you to focus on your culinary passion while AI assists you in repetitive tasks, helps you solve scenarios and inspires you with new ideas.
faq.q2: What specific tools does AI Chef Pro offer for my professional management?
faq.a2: AI Chef Pro offers a variety of tools focused on your growth as a chef: Catering AI+ for event planning, Food Pairing AI for discovering innovative combinations, Mermas GenCal for optimizing ingredient use, ID Allergens for ensuring food safety, Mental Coach for your professional wellbeing, and others. It also includes thematic recipe generators, weekly the system releases a new app within the suite that responds to a solution.
faq.q3: What are the available subscription plans and their prices?
faq.a3: We offer plans adapted to different stages of your career as a chef: Member (Free) to explore basic functionalities, Pro (‚Ç¨10/month) ideal for individual chefs, Premium (‚Ç¨15/month) for frequent use and greater creativity, Premium Pro (‚Ç¨25/month) for chefs in leadership roles, and Premium Plus (‚Ç¨50/month) with unlimited use for executive chefs. Each plan is designed to support your professional growth and adapt to your changing needs as a chef.
faq.q4: What level of technological experience do I need to use AI Chef Pro?
faq.a4: AI Chef Pro is designed with chefs and professionals of all technological levels in mind. The interface is intuitive and easy to use, accessible from computers and mobile devices so you can use it in the kitchen or wherever you need it. The system learns from your preferences, offering increasingly relevant suggestions. You don't need to be a technology expert; if you can use a smartphone, you'll be able to make the most of AI Chef Pro.
faq.q5: How does AI Chef Pro protect my recipes and personal data?
faq.a5: We understand that your recipes are your most valuable intellectual property. At AI Chef Pro, we use advanced encryption technologies to protect all your information. Your recipes and personal data are kept strictly confidential and never shared. We offer regular backup options to ensure you never lose your work. Your creativity and privacy are safe with us.
faq.q6: Can I try AI Chef Pro before subscribing?
faq.a6: Absolutely! We offer a free Member plan that lets you explore AI Chef Pro's basic functionalities without commitment. It's an excellent way to discover how the platform can enhance your creativity and efficiency as a chef. When you're ready to access more features and take your kitchen to the next level, you can easily upgrade to one of our paid plans.
